invoice.ext_unique_id: <!-- length=> 100; UI|! vastavalt seadetele| --> <!-- if Directo number/code is not used, this is alternative ID; It must be unique for each document and remain same if more than one transaction of the same document is necessary -->
invoice.number: <!-- length=> 9; UI|Arve| --><!-- document number/ID, mandatory; It must be unique for each document and remain same if more than one transaction of the same document is necessary -->
invoice.vatzone: <!-- UI|Maa| --><!-- local = 0, EU = 1, export = 2 --> <!-- ALT.FROM=> customer > 0 -->
invoice.paymentterm: <!-- 32; UI|T-ting| --> <!-- ALT.FROM=> customer --> <!-- kui on kasutusel laekumiste loomine, läheb see kood ka laekumise makseviisiks -->
invoice.currencyrate: <!-- UI|Kurss| --> <!-- ALT.FROM=> ECB current published rates -->
invoice.customercode: klient_kood<!-- length=> 32; UI|Klient| --> <!-- mandatory by default! -->
